summary:
Two plugins that i created and used in Skyrim for some time, one
Is Farmhouse in Winterhold the other Farmhouse near Serpent\'s Bluff Redoubt. I 
have tested them and decided to share them with the community. Both houses are 
navmeshed, give you well rested perk, Unique items, NPCs Guarding them 
(recommended level 14).
descriptionHtml:
Here are two plugins that i created and used in Skyrim for some time, one
Is Farmhouse in Winterhold the other Farmhouse near Serpent\'s Bluff Redoubt. I 
have tested them and decided to share them with the community. Both houses are 
navmeshed, give you well rested perk, Unique items, NPCs Guarding them 
(recommended level 14). 

And Below The Description of each plugin:


[center][color=#00BFFF][b]<--SABRE ROCK-->[/b][/color][/center]
 
[center][color=#DBA901]This Plugin adds player owned home near Serpent\'s Bluff Redoubt 
made after Merryfair Farm from the rift. Contains all crafting 
tables, smelter, display room, garden, Alchemy Shop... there are
also some notes and one journal; a bit of the back story. 
Watch out because the house is surrounded by sabre cats :D

See screenshots marked with \"Sabre Rock\" for more information.[/color][/center]


[color=#A9F5F2]Installation:[/color]
						     
-Place Home09.esp Meshes And Textures
     into your Skyrim Data folder
  -or use NMM




[color=#FE642E]Uninstallation:[/color]

 -Remove Home09.esp Meshes And Textures
     from your Skyrim Data folder 
  -Manually	
  -Use Skyrim launcher	
  -or NMM	


[color=#3ADF00]Bugs/Issues[/color]
		
 -No bugs or errors so far 		 	


[color=#04B404]Changelog[/color]

I will not be updating this plugin except 
 there are some requests.





[center][color=#00BFFF][b]<--WINTERHOLD HOME-->[/b][/color][/center]


[center][color=#DBA901]This Plugin adds Player owned farmhouse in winterhold; originally 
created for myself whilst playing as mage. It\'s a small home containing
as usual all crafting tables except The Smelter. see screenshots for 
more info on the design.

This Plugin also allows u to craft enchantable:
 -Bear armor
 -Savior\'s Hide
 -College Robes
 -Mage Robes
 -Mage Hoods
 -Jester\'s Outfit
 -Psijic Robes
 -Weeding Dress
 -Sheogorath Outfit (only Male)[/color][/center]


[color=#A9F5F2]Installation:[/color]
 -Place WinterHaus.esp into your Skyrim Data folder
 -or use NMM




[color=#FE642E]Uninstallation[/color]
 -Remove WinterHaus.esp from your Skyrim Data folder

  -Manually	
 -Use Skyrim launcher	
 -or NMM	



[color=#3ADF00]Bugs/Issues[/color]
 -Followers may block your way out of the laboratory;
   in that case make sure u have your unrelenting force
   favored :D 
 -No other bugs or errors so far


[color=#04B404]Changelog[/color]

 I will not be updating this plugin except
 there are some reasonable requests.

[color=#B404AE]Credits[/color]

 -ZeniMax Media
 -Skyrim Nexus
 -		  


Have Fun!
author: AstralSystems
